pserve = pyramid.scripts.pserve:main

ptweens = pyramid.scripts.ptweens:main
pviews = pyramid.scripts.pviews:main

[paste.server_runner]
cherrypy = pyramid.scripts.pserve:cherrypy_server_runner

[pyramid.pshell_runner]
